# big-footer



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute         | Description                                                                            | Type                                          | Default     |
| --------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `bottomBg`      | `bottom-bg`       | The background color of the below part of the component.                               | `"black" \| "blue" \| "gray" \| "light-gray"` | `undefined` |
| `bottomColor`   | `bottom-color`    | The color of the below part of the component.                                          | `"white"`                                     | `undefined` |
| `showIcon`      | `show-icon`       | If true, the icon will get shown.                                                      | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `showSitemap`   | `show-sitemap`    | If true, the sitemap will get shown.                                                   | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `topBg`         | `top-bg`          | The background color of the above part of the component.                               | `"black" \| "blue" \| "gray" \| "light-gray"` | `undefined` |
| `topBorderY`    | `top-border-y`    | If true, the top and bottom borders of the above part of the component will get shown. | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `topLeftColor`  | `top-left-color`  | The color of the left part of the above part of the component.                         | `"blue" \| "white"`                           | `undefined` |
| `topRightColor` | `top-right-color` | The color of the right part of the above part of the component.                        | `"white"`                                     | `undefined` |
